name: ReIncarnage - Desktop
description:
You're safe, but there is no power to your computer, what use is life without memes?

Make your way through the enemy riddled rooms and get that juice pumping!

The closer you get to death the stronger your attack becomes and the faster you throw projectiles at your enemies (those projectiles are enemy heads, because why not), right click to drop a Z-bomb, this will eliminate all enemies in range, be wary though, it'll cost you 100 ammo, half your damage modifier and the enemies won't drop any ammo.

Don't worry if you die, you get a damage and ammo boost!
